destination.description: The destination of the sink (or, in other words, where logs are written to). Can be a

filter.description: The filter to apply when exporting logs. Only log entries that match the filter are exported.

project.description: The ID of the project to create the sink in. If omitted, the project associated with the provider is

unique_writer_identity.description: Whether or not to create a unique identity associated with this sink. If `false`

bigquery_options.description: Options that affect sinks exporting data to BigQuery. Structure documented below.
